page.title: 11Communications and Charities
page.content: her own . She delivers letters to 223 houses in Tollerton daily.Hardly any mail is delivered outside the village. The mail is delivered to Tollerton from Easingwold Post Office. There is one telephone box situated on a main road going through Tollerton .90% of the users are passers by.There is a danger of Tollerton losing its telephone box because British Telecom needs to raise Â£185 a year to keep it operating.At present the Tollerton box is not making that amount of money. Often it is vandalised and needs regular repair which is costly. Â£1,000 pounds was raised for Guide Dogs this year in Tollerton.Fund raising started in 1980,mostly through Darts and Domino competitions held in the Black Horse.There is a Trophy for darts and
